entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 29
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo from the special event 2000-0100 With Ananya, Pune, India has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 2000.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
